reviewText: Husband says it's not as expected as the first time he bought fist of the north star 3, it had all the episodes, 1-30 and for only $15, but this one was short a few episodes.

In episodes 7-9, Kenshiro continues his quest to find Julia, but a new problem arises in the form of God's Army, a psychotic military group that Kenshiro decides to wipe out. This makes for some of the best fight scenes yet. The dubbed version tends to "dumb down" some of the dialogue and adds unecessary cussing, so buy the subtitled version.
Get your hands on all volumes including this one, If you love Anime, or fist of the north star, you will not be disappointed

Gary Daniels' finnest movie yet! this epic Martial Art film has the action to match. Gary Daniels lets loose and shows off his stuff in this wonderfully done postapocaliptic action adventure.  Filled with love, hate,  revenge, fear, and the romance of uncertainty, the most powerful human  emotions. And don't forget some of the most increadable butt-kicking fight  scenes ever filmed!!  And must watch!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
